mapper.select: SELECT k.sku_id, k.product_class_id, k.price, k.amount,k.seller_id, s.seller_name, p.product_class_name, i.p_image_path, pp.is_sale_property, pp.property_name, pp.property_value from sku_info k INNER JOIN seller_info s on s.seller_id = k.seller_id INNER JOIN product_class_info p ON p.product_class_id = k.product_class_id INNER JOIN product_image_info i ON i.product_class_id = p.product_class_id INNER JOIN product_property_info pp ON k.sku_id = pp.sku_id WHERE i.p_image_main = 1 and k.sku_id=#{sku_id}

SELECT k.sku_id, k.product_class_id, k.price, k.amount,k.seller_id, s.seller_name, p.product_class_name, i.p_image_path from sku_info k INNER JOIN seller_info s on s.seller_id = k.seller_id INNER JOIN product_class_info p ON p.product_class_id = k.product_class_id INNER JOIN product_image_info i ON i.product_class_id = p.product_class_id WHERE i.p_image_main = 1 and k.sku_id=#{sku_id}

SELECT s.sku_id, s.amount, s.price, s.sale_number, p.product_class_name, b.brand_ch_name, p.product_class_id, b.class_id, i.p_image_path, s.seller_id, sl.seller_name FROM sku_info s INNER JOIN product_class_info p ON s.product_class_id = p.product_class_id INNER JOIN brand_info b ON b.brand_id = p.brand_id INNER JOIN product_image_info i on i.product_class_id= p.product_class_id INNER JOIN seller_info sl on s.seller_id = sl.seller_id where b.class_id = #{0} and i.p_image_main=1 ORDER BY ${sort} LIMIT #{2}, #{3}
